description:
On Rin-chan`s latest expedition, the team overcomes countless obstacles and dangers. What truth will Rin-chan uncover?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Rin-chan Expedition Party Mystery! Search for the Legendary Sasshie! / Fluff: The Terrifying Invader
Rin-chan Tankentai Shinpi! Maboroshi no Sasshie o Sagase! / Mofu: Kyoufu no Shinryaku Seibutsu
リンちゃん探検隊神秘! 幻のサッシーを探せ! / MOFU ~恐怖の侵略生物~
